text: Suicide due to potential unemployment How many of you are unemployed or soon to be unemployed and struggle with suicidal impulses    I had ambitions and dreams  I worked hard but the goddess of failure seems to be in love with me for years  Nothing seems to work  In the future I am looking at  It seems I will become a parasite  I live in a place where the economy was already crap and the few companies that hire fresh grads have reduced hiring numbers due to Covid  I live in a kind of abusive home with a highly bipolar parent who now and then guilts me for being a failure  There is no social safety net here either and I don t know how to get out of the home in empty pockets and rebuild my life     For most of my life I have been alone and have always played safe   As a teenager  I always wondered why are some people so lost  homeless and hopeless  with sad and dead eyes  Now I think they are pretty brave that they don t kill themselves even when they realize they won t achieve or do anything significant in their life     Sorry for this rant of an immature kid  Just wanted to vent somewhere

text: An update to a since deleted post I madeMade a post here Sunday of this week  I ll recap before the update   I m so deeply unhappy with my life  I see no future where I m not just depressed  The only glue I had holding me together was the hope that this girl I ve been talking to for over a year would like me and want to have a relationship  We went on a date on Saturday  it went really well but I m just not sure that it can bring me enough happiness for me to not end it all anyways Today she let me know that while she likes hanging out with me  and is excited for our prom  we re going together in   weeks  she isn t in a place right now where she wants a relationship  At first I felt relief  I don t have to worry about trying to not fuck up a relationship  It s been a few hours though and I feel worse than I ever had in my life  I updated my suicide note for the first time in a year  My life is completely falling apart  My grades are going to shit  I just don t think I can find happiness  I want to die so bad  and now I have no reason to keep holding on  I don t blame her for what she said  she can feel how she wants  I don t want to force her into a relationship she doesn t want to be in  Our prom is going to suck now though  I m just going to be an awkward mess the whole night  I don t know what to do and the only alternative to this shitty existence that I can see is slowly becoming more and more a good idea  Rant over  I want to die
